description: Azco Real Estate Brokers (LLC) is proud to offer you this astonishing and elegantly designed property located in the most sought-after residential community in Dubai, Arjan. Arjan is a new district within Dubailand, situated on the outskirts of Dubai. The community is bordered by Al Barsha South towards the north and Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road towards the south. Further down south, there is Dubai Motor City – home to Dubai Autodrome. The project was launched in 2006 as part of the Dubailand development. By September 2020, the community has 48 completed buildings and another 37 are under development. The road network is fully developed. Arjan features residential complexes, commercial buildings and retail developments. The neighbourhood is popular for having two of the most visited parks in Dubai: Dubai Miracle Garden and Dubai Butterfly Garden. location: Cluster 6, Jumeirah Islands, Dubai
breadcrumbs: Villas for Rent in Dubai > Jumeirah Islands > Cluster 6 Villas
description: AX CAPITAL Real Estate is pleased to present this stunning property to the rental market.   Having a large balcony with stunning views of the lake and skyline, this is a truly beautiful villa located in the exclusive Jumeirah Islands development. The Entertainment Foyer layout coupled with European Cluster theme and Costa Del Sol styling makes this villa a stunning combination of style and chic. This property boasts an exquisite interior with additional Sun Room and fully functioning elevator.    • Size: 10,125 sq. ft. • 4 Bedrooms with En Suites +  Maids Room• Sumptuous Living Area• Full Lake and Skyline View• Additional Sun Room Overlooking The Lake• Elevator• Private Swimming Pool I Perfect For Family Living | Large Balcony•   Quiet Idyllic Setting | Gated Community | Opportunity to Purchase Additional GardenJumeirah Islands is one of Dubai’s most prestigious and sought-after communities, comprising of 50 islands (clusters), 46 of which are residential with a collection of luxury waterfront residences including villas, mansions and townhouses. At the heart of the community there is the Clubhouse, along with parks, leisure facilities and lush green landscapes. Jumeirah Islands offers an excellent location, with easy access to Dubai’s major roads, landmarks and it's many attractions.
